content:
Hi Amy,

Thank you for your response and clarification. I apologize for the confusion. At Televero Health, we are currently focusing on hiring psychiatrists and Licensed Clinical Social Workers (LCSWs). While we value your experience as an LPC Associate, our current openings are specifically for psychiatrists and LCSWs.

If you happen to know any psychiatrists or LCSWs in your professional network who may be interested in exploring opportunities at Televero Health, we would greatly appreciate any referrals. Your recommendation could make a significant impact on their career and help us continue providing quality mental health services to our clients.

We appreciate your interest and will keep your information on file for future opportunities that may align with your qualifications. Thank you again for connecting, and I wish you continued success in your career.

Best regards,
Bailey Baker
